column2: "You ever seen a Gilnach? You know, that pesky Mech repair unit? Talk about a major pain in the ass!"
"With that thing there, you'll just be fighting in circles; you'll have to clean that up first before all else."
"If you don't take it out quick, the little jerk will start repairing itself. As if it couldn't get any more annoying! So go take it out, okay?"
"I'm counting on you! I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face! "
